attributes.action: Give every member of the police force firearms training for life or death situations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we all know about the risks todays police officers face while on the streets of Britain.Only recently there were shootings of under 16s in the uk. Therefore every member of the police should be given a firearm and firearms training to tackle guncrime. Most police forces in the world carry pistols so why can't we?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
